H0.text: What world leader introduced Glasnost and Perestroika. Mikhail Suslov

H1.text: What world leader introduced Glasnost and Perestroika. Andrei Gromyko

H2.text: What world leader introduced Glasnost and Perestroika. Nikolai Ryzhkov

H3.text: What world leader introduced Glasnost and Perestroika. Gorbačëv

A4.text: On December 10, 1984, while poised to become the next Soviet General Secretary, Mikhail Gorbachev made a speech detailing the need for glasnost, alongside other reforms such as perestroika, and next year, becoming General Secretary, he launched the glasnost campaign.
